trans-unit.source: Represents a Microsoft Office Ribbon customization that is created by using the Ribbon Designer in an Office project in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Visual Studio 中通过使用 Office 项目中的功能区设计器创建的 Microsoft Office 功能区自定义项。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon> interface directly.
trans-unit.target: 通常不使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon>直接接口。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the Ribbon class that Visual Studio generates when you add a new **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to your project.
trans-unit.target: 请改用 Visual Studio 将生成时添加新的功能区类**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到你的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: You can accomplish most tasks related to the Ribbon by using events and properties in the generated Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以完成大多数向功能区通过使用生成的功能区类中的事件和属性相关联的任务。

trans-unit.source: The generated Ribbon class inherits from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 生成的功能区类继承自<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase>类。

trans-unit.source: This base class redirects all calls to its members to an internal implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon> interface the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此基类将对其成员的所有调用重都定向到的内部实现<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon>接口[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If you want to work with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon> object directly, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.Base%2A> property of the generated Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon>直接对象，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonBase.Base%2A>生成的功能区类的属性。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> instance is closing.
trans-unit.target: 关闭此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 实例时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to release application-specific resources that were allocated earlier, for example, in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来释放已分配更早版本，例如，在应用程序特定资源<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Inspector window, or the Explorer window in Outlook, that is associated with this Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Outlook 中与此功能区关联的检查器窗口或资源管理器窗口。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the Inspector window or Explorer window that is associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示与此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 对象关联的检查器窗口或资源管理器窗口。

trans-unit.source: In Outlook, this property refers to the Inspector window or Explorer window in which this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在 Outlook 中，此属性指的检查器窗口或资源管理器窗口中此<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon>显示。

trans-unit.source: In all other Office projects, this property returns null.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他 Office 项目中，此属性返回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default extension for this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 对象的默认扩展。

trans-unit.source: The default extension for this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 对象的默认扩展。

trans-unit.source: The default extension is an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension> object that is implemented by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 默认扩展名是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension>对象由实现[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Gets a custom extension for this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 对象的自定义扩展。

trans-unit.source: A custom extension for this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 对象的自定义扩展。

trans-unit.source: A custom extension is an implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension> interface in a solution that is created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 自定义扩展是一种实现的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension>通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的解决方案中的接口。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> can be used in multiple contexts simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 是否可以同时在多个上下文中使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> object is shared among multiple contexts; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 对象在多个上下文中共享，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon> objects that have this property set to `false` are created every time a new Outlook Inspector is opened.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon> 具有此属性设置为对象`false`每次打开新的 Outlook 检查器时创建。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> is loaded into the Microsoft Office application.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 加载到 Microsoft Office 应用程序时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.Load> event handler is automatically added to the Ribbon code file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.Load>事件处理程序将自动添加到功能区代码文件。

trans-unit.source: Use this event handler to run custom code when the Ribbon loads.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件处理程序功能区加载时运行自定义代码。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> loads, if the **ImageName** property is set for one or more controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果为一个或多个控件设置 ImageName 属性，则在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 加载时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event enables you to cache images in the Ribbon customization, which can improve performance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>事件，可以缓存中功能区自定义项，这可以提高性能的映像。

trans-unit.source: By default, an image is loaded into the Ribbon every time the user displays a tab that contains the image.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，映像加载到功能区，每次用户显示包含图像的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: An image is reloaded any time that you programmatically change the properties of a control on which the image appears.
trans-unit.target: 映像重新加载，以编程方式更改图像将显示的控件的属性的任何时间。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event to assign an image to a control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>事件将分配给控件的图像。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a tab on the Ribbon, the Microsoft Office application uses the cached image.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择功能区上的选项卡时，Microsoft Office 应用程序将使用缓存的映像。

trans-unit.source: If you modify a control property at run time, the Microsoft Office application will not reload the image on the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时修改控件属性，Microsoft Office 应用程序将不重新加载该控件上的映像。

trans-unit.source: This can give you a small performance gain.
trans-unit.target: 这可以为你提供可略微提高性能。

trans-unit.source: If you want to cache the image of a control, set the **ImageName** property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要缓存的控件图像，设置**ImageName**的控件属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event is not raised unless you set the **ImageName** property of at least one control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>除非你设置，则不会引发事件**ImageName**至少一个控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" /> that represents the Microsoft Office Menu customization.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office 菜单自定义项的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" /> that represents the Microsoft Office Menu customization.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" />，表示 Microsoft Office 菜单自定义项。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Office Menu is the menu that opens when you click the **Microsoft Office Button**.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office 菜单是当单击打开的菜单**Microsoft Office 按钮**。

trans-unit.source: You can add controls to the Microsoft Office Menu only by using the Ribbon Designer.
trans-unit.target: 只能通过使用功能区设计器，可以将控件添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add Controls to the Backstage View](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将控件添加到 Backstage 视图](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can access a read-only collection of Ribbon controls in the Microsoft Office Menu customization at run time by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu.Items%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.OfficeMenu%2A> instance that is exposed by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时的 Microsoft Office 菜单自定义项中的功能区控件的只读集合的访问通过使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu.Items%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.OfficeMenu%2A>公开由的实例<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Ribbon ID that was used to create this instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 对象的此实例的功能区 ID。

trans-unit.source: The Ribbon ID that was used to create this instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 接口的此实例的功能区 ID。

trans-unit.source: You should not attempt to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 不应尝试设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.RibbonType%2A> property to get all of the Ribbon IDs that are associated with this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon> instance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.RibbonType%2A>要获取与此相关联的功能区 Id 的所有属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.RibbonId%2A> property returns only the single ID that was used to create this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.RibbonId%2A>属性返回仅用于创建此单个 ID<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon>实例。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this property to determine whether this Ribbon instance is being displayed in a mail composition item.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用此属性来确定是否正在邮件组合项中显示的此功能区实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a comma-separated list of Ribbon IDs that are associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取功能区 ID 的逗号分隔的列表，这些功能区 ID 与此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 实例相关联。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of Ribbon IDs that are associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 功能区 ID 的逗号分隔的列表，这些功能区 ID 与此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 实例相关联。

trans-unit.source: Excel, Word, and PowerPoint typically have only one Ribbon ID in this property.
trans-unit.target: Excel、 Word 和 PowerPoint 通常在此属性中具有只有一个功能区 ID。

trans-unit.source: Outlook can have several IDs, corresponding to the various message classes for which the particular <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon> instance is valid.
trans-unit.target: Outlook 可以拥有多个 Id，为其对应的各个消息类特定<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon>实例无效。

trans-unit.source: The designer provides a drop-down list of valid Ribbon IDs.
trans-unit.target: 设计器提供有效的功能区 Id 的下拉列表。

trans-unit.source: Ribbon IDs are used to associate a Ribbon class with a particular context window.
trans-unit.target: 功能区 Id 用于将功能区类与特定的上下文窗口相关联。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to hide all built-in tabs on the Ribbon and most commands on the Microsoft Office Menu and display only the customizations that are defined in this Ribbon item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否隐藏功能区上的所有内置选项卡和 Microsoft Office 菜单上的大部分命令，并且是否仅显示在此功能区项中定义的自定义项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Ribbon displays only the customizations that are defined in this Ribbon item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果功能区仅显示在此功能区项中定义的自定义项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the visibility of custom tabs at run time if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你不能在运行时更改的自定义选项卡可见性，如果此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 中 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 中 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonOfficeMenu" /> 对象的集合。
